data.description: Discover the best events and things to do in Calgary, a vibrant city with a wide range of activities! Immerse yourself in the local culture as you watch ice skating enthusiasts enjoy their Tim Hortons coffee. Feel the excitement as residents cheer on the Calgary Flames and Calgary Stampede, embodying their passion for hockey and cowboy hats. Exciting events, captivating concerts, and engaging activities await around every corner.

Discover the best events and things to do in Vancouver! Experience the joy of kayaking alongside playful seals, embark on invigorating hikes, and embrace unique yoga sessions. Join the locals in enjoying hilarious stand-up comedy shows that will leave you laughing the night away with friends and family. In Vancouver, laughter and quirky escapades are always in store.

Welcome to Toronto, a city where skyscrapers touch the sky and breathtaking lake views await! Indulge in the diverse food scene where poutine and sushi become the perfect pair. Take your bravery to new heights at the iconic CN Tower and soak up the vibrant entertainment in downtown.

Discover the excitement of Edmonton! From exhilarating bison encounters at Elk Island to enchanting winter adventures in ice castles, there's no shortage of unforgettable experiences and events. Join the poutine craze, indulge in non-stop concerts, make a splash at waterparks, and immerse yourself in lively festivals.

Welcome to Seattle, where the Emerald City meets epic adventures! Rain or shine, this place rocks. Stroll through Pike Place Market, catch a glimpse of the iconic Space Needle, and taste your way through a coffee paradise. Then, dive into the funky Fremont neighbourhood and embrace its quirky art. Coffee, music, and stunning scenery await in this Pacific gem!

Welcome to Winnipeg, the heart and soul of the prairies! Immerse yourself in a city that has a blend of rich history, thriving arts, and a bustling culinary scene. From festivals that celebrate diverse cultures to exploring the scenic beauty of parks and rivers, Winnipeg offers year-round excitement.

Discover the enchanting city of Saskatoon, where prairie beauty meets urban excitement! Whether you're exploring the stunning riverbank, immersing yourself in the thriving arts and music scene, or indulging in culinary delights inspired by local flavors, Saskatoon offers an unforgettable experience throughout the year, leaving you in awe of its natural charm and vibrant cultural tapestry

Discover Edinburgh, Texas: A vibrant hub of events, attractions, and unique activities. Dive into the heart of Texas culture, enjoy unforgettable experiences, and make memories in Edinburgh's top destinations. Your next adventure awaits!

Welcome to Kelowna, the vibrant gem of the Okanagan Valley! From picturesque vineyards and orchards to breathtaking lakes and mountains, our city is a year-round paradise offering endless adventures, delectable culinary experiences, and captivating cultural events that will leave you mesmerized

Ottawa, Canada's capital, where stunning architecture and a vibrant art scene await! Discover the city's 29 museums, explore beautiful parks, and take leisurely walks along tree-lined streets. Immerse yourself in the beauty of gardens and indulge in chic cafes, brunch spots, and lively farmers markets. Ottawa, is a city that will capture your heart.

Welcome to Victoria, a charming city that combines coastal beauty with captivating experiences! Explore serene gardens and historic architecture as you stroll along the Inner Harbour. Immerse yourself in the local arts scene, from intimate galleries to lively street performances. Join in the coastal rhythm as you indulge in fresh seafood and enjoy outdoor adventures, creating unforgettable memories at every turn.

Welcome to Whistler, the ultimate playground for snow enthusiasts and mountain adventurers! Experience the majesty of the mountains and the fluffy snow. Prepare for heart-racing adventures, from exhilarating skiing to epic explorations on mountain biking trails. The possibilities for fun things to do and engaging activities are limitless.

Welcome to Hamilton, a city of endless exploration! Dive into local museums where history comes to life, embrace the vibrant arts scene where creativity is at every corner, and explore the bustling downtown where music fills the air. And the best part? Just a short distance away, you'll find nature trails, parks, and breathtaking waterfalls, waiting to be explored.

Come visit the white sand beaches in Prince Edward and soak up the sun. Get ready for tastings that will make your taste buds sing with joy at the local wineries and distilleries. Immerse yourself in the city's vibrant festivals, and set sail with the Yacht Clubs for an adventure on the waves. The perfect recipe for the best time!

results.name: GlobalFest (Nightly Admission) - 2024
results.description_without_html:
The International Fireworks Festival and the OneWorld Festival presented by TD returns to Elliston Park in the summer of 2024.
The OneWorld Festival sees the return of the cultural pavilions, performance stages with live multi-cultural entertainment, a kid’s area with activities for the little ones, night market vendors and a delicious selection of international food vendors to complete your outdoor festival experience.
The presenting pyrotechnic teams for the International Fireworks Festival are:

Thursday, August 15 – 2023 Champion
Saturday, August 17 – Brazil
Tuesday, August 20- Mexico
Thursday, August 22- USA
Saturday, August 24 – Canadian Finale

Children aged 5 and under are admitted free when accompanied by an adult.
Park gates open 6pm, fireworks commence after sunset, between 930pm and 10pm.
GlobalFest is an outdoor festival, and we go ahead rain or shine. The pyromusical presentation is only postponed to the following night if there is high winds or electrical storms.
There is NO parking available at Elliston Park. Both General Admission ticket holders and VIP Pass holders have a return shuttle service from offsite parking lots to GlobalFest. Please visit GlobalFest FAQ at https://globalfest.ca/faq/ for more information. 
----------
NEW! - Premier Viewing Bowl Ticket
The Premiere Viewing Bowl Ticket gives you access to the "Premiere Viewing Bowl". Here you will will find:

The largest OneWorld Performance Ensembles
The absolute best viewing of the Pyromusical Fireworks: best viewing of the nautical (water) effects, best reflections of the fireworks the higher up you sit and closest seats outside of VIP to the fireworks
Full bar just a few steps away

General admission tickets no longer includes access to the Premiere Viewing Bowl.
----------
VIP VillageThe VIP area opens at 6pm and is available to VIP ticket holders only.
Enjoy the closest view of the fireworks, with a view of the launch site directly across the lake. Bring your own picnic blanket or lawn chairs.Light snacks are available in GlobalFest VIP Tent on arrival (first come, first served) plus private cash bar and extended drink menu.
VIP Parking is located off-site at a designated parking lot. VIP ticket holders will park at the designated parking lot and a shuttle bus service will take you directly to the VIP Entrance and back. 
*Limited private VIP Hosting Tents are available for a minimum of 50 guests. For more information, please contact the GlobalFest Office to discuss pricing options or email contactus@globalfest.ca

results.name: Heritage Park Admission
results.description_without_html:
Heritage Park is one of Canada’s leading living history museums, and is celebrating its 60th anniversary in 2024 with new attractions, ultra-special events and more to make it the Best. Year. Ever! With more than 200 exhibits and attractions spread over 127 acres of lush parkland, Heritage Park has a lot to offer both the history buff and the pleasure seeker. It balances historical fact with adventure, discovery and family fun.
Experience Western Canadian history as you hop aboard an antique steam train, set sail aboard Calgary's only paddle wheeler and visit the farm animals at the ranch. Learn about Indigenous cultures and traditions, tour a turn-of-the-century coal mine and take a spin on the Big Eli Ferris Wheel in the Antique Midway. Explore a bustling young prairie town, discover one of the world’s largest public collections of antique vehicles at Gasoline Alley Museum and so much more. The Historical Village is open daily from 10 am to 5 pm from the May long weekend until the first weekend in September, and open weekends until mid-October. Gasoline Alley Museum and the Railway Café are open year-round!
Coming with 15 people or more? Get group admission!
Frequently Asked Questions
When is a good time to visit Heritage Park?
Please don’t book your ticket to Heritage Park on a travel day. The Historical Village is open daily from 10 am to 5 pm from the May long weekend until Labour Day Weekend, then open weekends until mid-October. Gasoline Alley Museum and the Railway Café are open year-round.
What should I bring with me?
Heritage Park wants you to take away lasting memories, so bring your camera and your imagination! There are lots of outdoor exhibits and activities, so dress for the weather, wear sunscreen and put on a good pair of walking shoes.
Is there food available at Heritage Park?
We have several options for food services at Heritage Park. In the Historical Village, enjoy a sit-down meal at  the Wainwright Hotel, or grab something from one of several other restaurants with sit-down or takeout options, including the Club Café, Shepard Station and more. If you're looking for a sweet treat, take a visit to the famous Alberta Bakery, the Midway Treatery, the Vulcan Ice Cream parlour and more. In the front plaza of the Park, grab great diner food and Alberta Bakery goodies from the Railway Café! Learn more about our dining options.

results.name: MC4D THE STAMPEDE WRAP UP PARTY
results.description_without_html:
RANCHMANS PRESENTS MC4D
THE STAMPEDE WRAP UP PARTY
SUNDAY, JULY 14th
This event promises to be an electrifying event with MC4D taking the stage as the headline entertainment. MC4D, composed of twin brothers Matt and Chris Drake, is renowned for their unique fusion of country and EDM music.
Their signature country-dance crossover sound has garnered them a dedicated and rapidly expanding fanbase.
With their popular country-EDM Down Under Mix series, MC4D has topped the charts on SoundCloud's U.S. dance charts and accumulated over 10 million streams in the past year alone.
Their remixes of artists such as Zach Bryan and Noah Kahan have gone viral on platforms like TikTok and Instagram, accumulating tens of millions of views and amassing over 150,000 followers across various social media platforms.
Don't miss your chance to witness MC4D live in concert, as he brings his undeniable talent and passion for music to Ranchmans Calgary on July 14th.
Get ready for a night filled with unforgettable melodies, and infectious energy!
 
TICKET OPTIONS:
FANZONE: STANDING ROOM ONLY
GENERAL ADMISSION: STANDING ROOM ONLY
VIP TABLE OF SIX: GUARANTEED TABLE FOR 6
BOTTLE SERVICE VIP SECTIONS:
VIP SECTION FIRST BOTTLE INCLUDED
THE BULLPEN (15 GUESTS)
THE CORAL (10 GUESTS)
THE CHUTE (15 GUESTS) x2
THE LOFT (30 GUESTS)
LIMITED TICKETS AVAILABLE AT THE DOOR
18+ Event 
 
 
Join our mailing list at ranchmans.ca for exclusive offers.

results.name: Gaurav Kapoor Live
results.description_without_html:
Gaurav Kapoor, the funny one from Delhi is coming to Canada for the first time.
One of the funniest and most prolific stand-up acts of the recent times, Gaurav Kapoor's Vlogs have created a fan base of their own. 1M+ on YouTube, 400K+ on Insta, an IMDB 8.2 rated special on Amazon Prime, Gaurav has proven year after year that he is funny and relatable across all formats.
His massive live shows and regular VLogs are making him a household name. His journalism degree and retail job experience now seem like stories from another life, but Gaurav claims he still remembers all the keyboard shortcuts, just in case.
Nothing is off limits when this Dilliwala talks about life, relationships, friendships, societal norms, the rich and the poor and everything in between. Raw, unfiltered, and funny. That's what audiences can expect when Gaurav Kapoor gets on the mic.

results.name: RACE 24- OCTOBER 5- EVE OF DESTRUCTION
results.description_without_html:
Saturday, October 5TH, 2024  - EVE OF DESTRUCTION
 
NO CHAIRS WITH SEAT BACKS ARE PERMITTED!
 
Workmans OK Tire, Brighton Recycling and Hotch’s Auto presents EVE OF DESTRUCTION including School Bus Races, Demolition Derby, 100 Lap Monster Endro, Juniors Race, Ladies Race, Flagpole and Trailer Race
Gates Open at 11:00 am, Racing Starts at 1:00 pm.
 THIS EVENT IS RAIN OR SHINE! PLEASE COME PREPARED FOR THE DAY.
By purchasing a ticket you are committing to your seat.  There are no refunds.  Cancellations are permitted only until noon on Friday by contacting the Speedway Office at angie@brightonspeedway.com.  Your ticket purchase will be forwarded to the next event.
 
Visit www.brightonspeedway.ca for more details or follow us on Facebook.

results.name: Benson Boone Live at Coca-Cola Stage | Calgary Stampede 2024
results.description_without_html:
Benson Boone Live at Coca-Cola Stage | Calgary Stampede 2024
Date: Sunday, July 14th, 2024Time: 10:00 PMLocation: Coca-Cola Stage, Calgary Stampede
Join us for an unforgettable evening with global hitmaker Benson Boone at the Coca-Cola Stage during Calgary Stampede 2024. Known for his intimate, diaristic pop songs, Benson Boone has captured hearts worldwide with chart-topping singles like "Beautiful Things," "To Love Someone," and "GHOST TOWN." Signed by Imagine Dragons frontman Dan Reynolds to Night Street Records, Boone's career has skyrocketed with over 2 billion streams to date and multiple RIAA certifications. Don't miss the opportunity to experience his captivating performance as he kicks off his headline world tour and shares tracks from his highly anticipated new album, Fireworks and Rollerblades.
-----

results.name: Brewery & the Beast Calgary - 2024 - Main Event
results.description_without_html:
Brewery & the Beast Tickets are your inclusive pass to an exceptional day of food, beverage and entertainment. Event tickets provide guests with unlimited access to the chefs delicious creations and non-alcoholic beverages. 8 x tickets for craft beer, cider, hard seltzers, cocktails and wine are included in the ticket price.
What can I expect?

The Food: 50+ chefs will be cooking incredible dishes with locally sourced proteins and ingredients. Savour as many dishes as you want, it's all included! Visit our website to see who will be cooking at the festival. 
Drinks: Beer = 12oz, Cider = 10oz, Seltzers & Hard Teas = 12oz, Cocktails = 1oz, Wine = 3oz. No long lines for sample size drinks here!
The Venue: Fort Calgary offers a spacious outdoor setting to wander and graze in the heart of downtown Calgary. 

Main Event Experience: 2:00pm - 5:00pm
Main Event Tickets include: inclusive access to the delicious meat-centric food offerings from 50+ award-winning restaurants and chefs, and all non-alcoholic beverages throughout the day. PLUS: Eight (8) beverage tickets to be used for alcoholic beverages. Beer = 12 oz, Cider = 10 oz, Seltzers & Hard Teas = 12oz, Wine = 3 oz, Cocktail = 1 oz. One (1) ticket = One (1) beverage of your choice.
Brewery & the Beast celebrates the outdoor roots of the festival by giving chefs free reign to be bold, innovate and creative while preparing their dishes over open fire. Beef, bison, pork, lamb, goat, chicken, elk, rabbit, duck and wild boar are featured in dishes offered throughout the event and are prepared using traditional and innovative techniques that involve live fire cooking, whole animal roasts, smoking, braising and grilling.

results.name: Showdown at Heritage Park: A Wild West Adventure
results.description_without_html:
It’s our 60th Anniversary, and we’re celebrating with a BRAND NEW experience, Showdown at Heritage Park: A Wild West Adventure! This family-friendly evening kicks off with a cowboy buffet and western entertainment. After dinner, step outside as a spectacular wild west gunfight erupts on Main Street. And, don’t forget to grab a treat at the Claresholm General Store! Showdown at Heritage Park is the perfect grand finale after a fun-filled day at the Historical Village. Or, gather your herd – groups of eight or more get a 10% discount on seats. Reserve your seats today!
Dates: July 12, 19, 20, 21, 26 and 28
Time: 5 – 9 pm
Location: Wainwright Hotel
Member Discount: Members get a 15% discount on seats for Showdown at Heritage Park! To receive your discount, choose the member rate tickets when choosing your seats. Then, enter your membership card number at checkout! Your membership card number is located on the back of your membership card. Each card has the letters ‘MC’, followed by the number. Please note: Members can get a maximum of 8 discounted tickets. Please bring your membership card on the day of the event. Membership cards will be checked in-person. If you don't have a membership card, you will be charged the full rate.
Adult (16+): $120 plus GST
Child (3-15): $84.99 plus GST
Group of Eight Discount: Gather your herd! groups of eight or more get a 10% discount on seats! How to redeem: When you buy 8 or more seats on Showpass, a 10% discount will automatically be applied!
Important Additional Information
Event Access and Parking:  Guests who have purchased Park admission for the day of their show ticket should proceed to Wainwright Hotel by 5:00 pm, as Security clears the Park. Guests coming for Showdown at Heritage Park only may enter the Historical Village at 4:30 pm via Security, located under the clock tower in the Park’s front plaza. Guests may take the complimentary shuttle bus to the Wainwright Hotel. Please allow 15-20 minutes for transport time. Please note strollers and wagons are not permitted on the bus. Guests can park in the front lots of Heritage Park. There is a $5 evening fee for parking. Please register your license plate at a ParkPlus machine or on the app. Members who have the parking add-on can park for free. Click here to learn more about parking..
Seating Arrangements: Guests can choose their seats using the seat map provided on Showpass. Tables may be rearranged depending on capacity. If there is a guest at another table you'd like to be near, please indicate this by answering the question provided at checkout.
Dietary Restrictions, Allergy, Highchair and Booster Seat Accommodations: Please note any dietary restrictions, allergies, highchair or booster seat requirements by answering the questions provided at checkout and we will accommodate them.
Run of Show: Doors to the Wainwright Hotel open at 5 pm. From 5 – 6 pm, the Wainwright Hotel bar room will offer alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages and snacks for purchase. Expect to meet some wild west characters! The cowboy buffet opens at 6 pm. At 7:30 pm, guests will exit the Wainwright Hotel to enjoy a spectacular wild west gunfight on Main Street. At 8 pm, the gun fight will conclude, and guests will have the opportunity to take photos with the cast. Our old-fashioned candy store, the Claresholm General Store will be open from 5 – 9 pm. The event ends at 9 pm. Guests may walk or take the shuttle bus back to security.
Refund and Cancellation Policy: Tickets are non-refundable and non-transferable to a future event.
 
Sunset Showdown Buffet Menu
Forty Creek BBQ Whole Roasted Alberta Beef Striploin
Dijon and horseradish
Honey Mustard Glazed Chicken Drumsticks
Oven-Roasted Baby Red Potatoes with Herbs and Sea Salt
Market Vegetables
Salted Buttered Corn on the Cobb
Classic Cesar Salad with Lemon Garlic Dressing
Farmer Greens with Assorted Dressing
Freshly-Baked Cornbread with Butter
Fireside Baked Beans
Fresh Seasonal Fruit Platter
Fresh Alberta Bakery Dessert Squares, Cookies and Tarts
Locally-Roasted Coffee and Tea Selection

results.name: Zen Garden 2024
results.description_without_html:
Join us in Calgary on Saturday, Sept. 14th, 2024 as we transform Waterfront Park on the banks of the Bow River into 3 lush garden dance floors.
https://www.zengardenfestival.com Waterfront Park | CLICK TO MAP | 18+ Event  + 3 Fully Immersive Stages Powered by PK Sound  + Licensed Cantinas  + Food Trucks  + Lots and Lots of Art  + Performances by:
>> Derrick Carter << Few artists have the legacy and track record of Derrick Carter, who is widely acknowledged as one of the best DJs in the world. With innovative productions, flawless technical skills and an effortlessly joyful attitude of rocking a crowd, his influence has infiltrated the entire spectrum of dance music. Having earned critical acclaim as a producer on a number of genre-defining recording projects, this Chicago legend is marked as one of the most influential players in the underground house music scene...past, present, and future.
LISTEN
 
>> Justin Martin <<
As the co-label boss of the iconic American label Dirtybird, Justin has established himself as one of the most popular and talented DJ/Producers on the planet. Having developed his unique sound through a catalogue of incredible solo EPs, his booty-shaking releases have earned industry-wide respect from peers & tastemakers from across the globe. Known for throwing down can’t miss sets from Space in Ibiza, to Shambhala deep in the heart of the Kootenays—expect lots of bass thumpin beats paired with melodic rhythms at our Azalea stage. 
LISTEN
 
>> DJ Heather << Internationally acclaimed DJ Heather hails from Brooklyn NY and has made a name for herself shaping the Chicago underground house music scene for 3+ decades. Her ability to seamlessly blend different genres while creating a unique and engaging experience for her audience has made her a favourite among house music lovers around the world. Her reputation as one of the premier selectors in the nation has led her to be showcased at festivals that include Movement in Detroit, WMC in Miami, and the Dirtybird Campout in SoCal.
LISTEN
 
>> Smalltown DJS <<
Fresh off their Juno nomination for Underground Dance Single of the Year, Smalltown serves up bass-heavy house music that combines the spirit of Canada's outdoor electronic music festivals such as Shambhala & Bass Coast-with the sound they cultivated at the legendary Hifi Club in Calgary. The boys have released highly acclaimed tracks on labels that include Dirtybird, Fool's Gold, Box of Cats, Sweat It Out!…and they ALWAYS leave you with sore feet after grooving to their sets.
LISTEN
 
>> Jessu & Pyka <<Fun & eclectic, Jessu & Pyka's sound is reminiscent of your Dad’s catalogue mixed with booty shaking dance music and house smashers. Embracing all flavours of house music, the pair have become known for high energy sets that get you MOVIN. Already fostering an online community most could only dream of, they have a rep for delivering a feel good blend of infectious dance music that brings BIG smiles to the dance floor.
LISTEN
 
>> Joanna Magik <<
Joanna's been fusing her signature style with an energetic stage presence to capture the hearts of dance floors across North America. Her sets cover all genres of house music, and as a producer her resume includes releases on some of today’s most influential house labels including: Box of Cats, Glasgow Underground and Farris Wheel Recordings—and is a 2023 winner of the Pete Tong x Apple Music DJ Mix series…we CAN’T WAIT to hear how she’ll follow-up her epic 2023 set. 
LISTEN
 
>> MYTHM << MYTHM's the truth of the Van City bass music scene, fortifying the explosive growth happening along on the west coast. Having launched his "Mind of Madness" album, he's received support from the likes of world renowned producers such as J:Kenzo, Truth, Zed’s Dead, Liquid Stranger, & Peekaboo. Riding this momentum, MYTHM leaves no room for stagnancy as he lives for the endless possibilities. 
LISTEN
 
>> Metafloor << Bass/Dubstep OG and founder of Calgary’s Sub Chakra crew—Metafloor relentlessly hustles proper sound system music. His productions have appeared on labels including Greazus’s Aufect Platinum, Black Tuna, and Mat the Alien’s Really Good Recordings and his skills as a selector have carried him to the stages of Bass Coast, Shambhala, Astral Harvest, and more.
LISTEN
 
>> DJ Pump <<
A Canadian DMC & ITF Champion, DJ Pump is a true party DJ that kills dance floors on the regular. Whilst mixing, scratching, creating or blending beats from hip-hop to funk, soul, disco, house and everything in between, Pump focuses on the overall musical composition and the sound of the end result. His Paradisco, Pleasure Principle, Jazzanova, and  Melting Pot parties set the standard for how to properly rock a joint in YYC.
LISTEN
 
>> Esette <<
Calgary's reigning queen of house, Esette's 20+ years of delivering mesmerizing sets has made her a household name in Western Canada. She (Isis Graham) is one of the guiding forces of cultural phenomena such as AEMCON, Girls on Decks, and the founder of our favourite summer party in YYC, Versions Patio Parties. We're STOKED to see what her and Miss Hazard dream up on our Lotus stage. 
LISTEN
 
>> Miss Hazard <<
Always pushing boundaries in the name of creativity, Miss Hazard's soundscape is an infusion of spacey textures and ethnic rhythms that mystically blend into a style of house that resists being classified into any specific genre. Her energy is electric and translates through the thick of a festival dance floor and the intimacy of a packed club. She'll be going B2B w/Esette on our Lotus stage.
LISTEN
 
>> Jon Delerious <<
Jon Delerious has been a staple in the Canadian House music scene since the mid 90's. His music ranges from smoked out dubby house, deep house, down tempo and always has a signature organic vibe. Jon's music appeals to a diverse audience and has been name checked from such artists as Gilles Peterson through to Laurent Garnier. Jon continues to refine his skills as a Canadian electronic musical innovator.
LISTEN
 
>> Carissa Gem <<
Hailing from BC's sunny interior, Carissa Gem grew up in the rave, and has been filling dance floors since before she was old enough to drive. Her sound is forward thinking and is constantly evolving. Drawing on influences from artists like Barisone, The Librarian, Mad Zach, and Danny Scrilla, you can expect her sets to be bass heavy with a healthy dose of rap. 
LISTEN
 
>> Joses <<
Joses musical style absorbs dance floor lessons from New York in the 70s, Italy in the 80s, London in the 90s and France in the 2000s...connecting disco to indie synth tunes and house music. Collaborations include work with Kathy Brown and Angelo Ferreri +more. He’s the founder of Disco In The Park & spreads the gospel of good vibes, funky music and positive energy.
LISTEN
 
>> Gabby Haze <<
 Gabby's setting the electronic music scene ablaze by captivating audiences worldwide. Her electrifying performances have graced renowned stages at Envision Festival in Costa Rica and on the Playa at Burning Man, among others. Gabby's intoxicating soundscapes blend deep basslines and ethereal melodies with forward-thinking trap and grime transport listeners to an immersive, ethereal realm driven by strong low-end focused mixing.
LISTEN
 
>> Tone D <<
Drawing inspiration from a range of influences including grime, jazz and the entire 140 spectrum, Tone D has developed a distinct style that blends deep, melodic beats with eclectic rhythms. Whether he's spinning at underground parties hosted by his Sub Chakra crew or @festivals, he never fails to captivate the audience with his dynamic sets.
LISTEN
 
>> SwaggaCats <<
SwaggaCats isn’t just a talented DJ, VJ and producer—he has also led various projects, including The Yellow Dubmarine. His agile, cat-like reflexes allow him to move between genres flawlessly. You may catch him playing an acid infused techno set one weekend, flexing a bass music set the next, and projection mapping the walls at the afters the next.
LISTEN
 
>> Gold Dust Diva <<
Born out of the dusts of the desert on a magical sunrise morning, the Gold Dust Diva has a love of deep funky house, booty bouncing beats and all the nostalgic throwbacks. She's VERY passionate about keeping her dancefloor moving! When she's not behind the decks, you'll find her shaking it front-and-center keeping the vibe where it needs to be!
LISTEN

results.name: Steph Strings (AUS) with special guest Morgen Le Fae
results.description_without_html:
Steph Strings (AUS) with special guest Morgen Le Fae
Where: Palomino Smokehouse and Social Club109 7 Avenue S.W Calgaryhttp://thepalomino.ca/18+ with government issued identificationWhen: Wednesday July 17, 2024Doors: 7:00pm / Music 8:00pmAdmission: $16.00 advance at www.showpass.com 
// General On-Sale: Fri May 3 @ 10AM (LOCAL)
NO JERK POLICY ALWAYS IN EFFECT!!
STEPH STRINGS (Melbourne, Australia)Steph Strings is an Australian based singer-songwriter from Australia who tells a story through her music. With influences from John Butler, Kim Churchill and Ziggy Alberts, Steph’s musical style entails bursts of percussion alongside Celtic, blues and coastal fingerstyle indie rock.
With the release of her 2023 EP ‘Lion’,Steph Strings sold out headline shows across Australia, UK, Europe and Canada. She supported Vance Joy and The Cat Empire across Canada and European tours, and performed at renowned international festivals Edmonton Folk Festival, Hillside Festival(Canada), Les Escales(France), Rolling Stone Weekender (Germany), Bass In The Grass, Blues on Broadbeach, Queenscliff, Ocean Sounds, Woodford Folk Festival (Australia).
In 2024, Steph is back with ‘Wholesome Days’, a track about the aftermath of a relationship breakdown and the hope and desire to forgive and reconnect. Steph Strings will return to Europe to perform a run of headline shows, performing in Italy, Spain, Portugal, France, Germany, Netherlands, Switzerland and more. Announced on the 2024 Ottawa Bluesfest line up in July alongside Neil Young, Maroon 5 and many more, will be taking Steph Strings to Canada with more shows to be announced soon.
https://stephstrings.comhttps://www.facebook.com/stephstringshttps://www.instagram.com/stephstringsmusic
 
Morgen Le FaeSinger, songwriter, vibologist doing other creative things.
https://www.instagram.com/morgen_le_faehttps://www.instagram.com/foundaway.studiohttps://open.spotify.com/album/79ePPTPslJYVaC6z1E4KQO
 
*This event takes place on the territory of the Blackfoot and the people of Treaty 7 Region in Southern Alberta, which includes the Siksika, the Piikuni, the Kainai, the Tsuu T'ina and the Stoney Nakoda First Nations. Calgary is also home to the Metis Nation of Alberta, Region III.NO JERK POLICY ALWAYS IN EFFECT!!

results.name: GlobalFest (5 Day Admission) - 2024
results.description_without_html:
The lnternational Fireworks Festival and the OneWorld Festival presented by TD returns to Elliston Park in the summer of 2024.
The OneWorld Festival sees the return of the cultural pavilions, performance stages with live multi-cultural entertainment, a kid’s area with activities for the little ones, night market vendors and a delicious selection of international food vendors to complete your outdoor festival experience.
The presenting pyrotechnic teams for the International Fireworks Festival are:

Thursday, August 15 – 2023 Champion
Saturday, August 17 – Brazil
Tuesday, August 20- Mexico
Thursday, August 22- USA
Saturday, August 24 – Canadian Finale

Children aged 5 and under are admitted free when accompanied by an adult.
Park gates open 6pm, fireworks commence after sunset, between 930pm and 10pm.
GlobalFest is an outdoor festival, and we go ahead rain or shine. The pyromusical presentation is only postponed to the following night if there is high winds or electrical storms.
There is NO parking available at Elliston Park. Both General Admission ticket holders and VIP Pass holders have a return shuttle service from offsite parking lots to GlobalFest. Please visit GlobalFest FAQ at https://globalfest.ca/faq/ for more information. 
----------
NEW! - The Premier Viewing Pass
The Premiere Viewing Pass gives you access to the "Premiere Viewing Bowl". Here you will will find:

The largest OneWorld Performance Ensembles
The absolute best viewing of the Pyromusical Fireworks: best viewing of the nautical (water) effects, best reflections of the fireworks the higher up you sit and closest seats outside of VIP to the fireworks
Full bar just a few steps away

General admission tickets no longer includes access to the Premiere Viewing Bowl.
----------
VIP VillageThe VIP area opens at 6pm and is available to VIP ticket holders only.
Enjoy the closest view of the fireworks, with a view of the launch site directly across the lake. Bring your own picnic blanket or lawn chairs.Light snacks are available in GlobalFest VIP Tent on arrival (first come, first served) plus private cash bar and extended drink menu.
VIP Parking is located off-site at a designated parking lot. VIP ticket holders will park at the designated parking lot and a shuttle bus service will take you directly to the VIP Entrance and back. 
*Limited private VIP Hosting Tents are available for a minimum of 50 guests. For more information, please contact the GlobalFest Office to discuss pricing options or email contactus@globalfest.ca

results.name: RevUp Calgary 2024
results.description_without_html:
Your favorite Premier Aftermarket Tuner Car Show is back! #REVUPYYC2024
 
Visit midnightrevup.com or on our social media platforms @midnightrevup for content, updates, merchandise and more!
 
Children up to 6 years old and 65+ are free of charge! 
 
Located in the "Exhibition Hall" on the 2nd floor at the Calgary Telus Convention Centre on July 20, 2024, doors open at 5:00 p.m.
 
Presented by:
VLF Wheels Canada
MERCARI Auto
Invision Auto Imports
RA Motorsports
Posh Auto Care
Vex Performance
International Motorcars
SpeedfactorYYC

Tuner Decals
Outcome Zero Hour

results.name: Rave Mama presents: Sunshine & Moonshine
results.description_without_html:
When Sunshine ☀ Meets Moonshine 🌙
Summer is here, and what better way to celebrate than with an outdoor party where you can be chill, relax and day & night party with friends? 😍
Join us for a 11 hours of melodic tones, exploring our vendor markets, and enjoying the live painting performance under the sun and moon. 🪭
This event will be hosted at the outdoor patio of Skunkworks Distillery, just a 10-minute drive 🚙 from downtown (with FREE PARKING available) and a 14-minute walk from the 39 AVE C-train station.🚃
After working closely with our local DJs for the past 11 months, we've become intimately familiar with their musicality and presence, allowing us to craft this lineup especially for this event. Our focus is on creating a seamless flow, ensuring that from the moment you step foot at our party, you experience a beautiful musical journey from start to finish. Each DJ is a headliner in their own genre, yet together they create an open-to-close party that we hope you will enjoy. 🎵🎶
Progressive and Trance - the perfect melody to pair beautifully with the sunset, overlooking the Calgary Tower and the Rocky Mountains. 🌄🌆
We believe this would be one of our favorite event of 2024. See you there! 😁
--- DJ Lineup ----
Messier 74 (Melodic House)Fidelak (Progressive House)Fidzen (Melodic Techno)Indy (Anjunabeats)Bochan (Progressive Trance)Kaeder (HyperTechno / Hard Dance)
Sound Provider: Ionic Sound Systems by Jay Michael
--- Vendor market ---
Bubble Gum Bass Kandi (Kandi)Cadsies (Digital Art & Fashion)Humbble Bee Dye (Dye Clothing)Nicolechowny Art (Crochet & Accessories)Elbas Creations (Crochet Artist)Rave Mama (Sunglasses)---- Workshop ----Shrinky Dink Workshop Curated by Nicolechowny Art 
 
**Please note that there will be a photographer present (@403abc), and the event will be video recorded.**
--- EVENT DETAIL ----📅DATE: 20 JULY 2024, SATURDAY⏰TIME: 2PM TIL 1AM🪩VENUE: SKUNKSWORKS DISTILLERY - OUTDOOR PATIO📍4009 4 ST SE, CALGARY🚃 14 MINS WALK from C TRAIN 🚙 10 MINS DRIVE from DOWNTOWN (FREE PARKING AVAILABLE)
---- TICKETING ----🙈$1 and Only - $1🐤SUPER EARLY BIRD - $10🐓EARLY BIRD - $15🎒SUNSHINE - $20😱LAST CHANCE - $25
THIS IS 18+ EVENT
 
Cancellation: In the event of extreme weather, the event will be postponed. Ticket holders will be notified 24 hours in advance.

location.name: Skunkworks Distillery - Moonshine and Cocktail Room

results.name: Summer Lobster Boil - Shawnessy
results.description_without_html:
Crack Open Summer at our Lobster Boil Event! 
Get your East Coast fix this summer at Blowers & Grafton! Our Summer Lobster Boil will take place between 4:00 p.m. and 8:00 p.m. on Wednesday, July 31st.
Each ticket includes a full lobster dinner and all the fixins:👇

One full Atlantic lobster
Fresh mussels
Prawns
Chris Brothers pepperoni
Juicy corn & potatoes
A golden-baked cheddar biscuit

Cost: $69.95 per ticket.
*Gratuity not included

FAQ's
Q: Do all members of my party require a ticket to attend?
No, you are welcome to attend the event with non-ticket holders. Non-ticket holders are welcome to order from the main menu. Upon purchasing your Summer Lobster Boil ticket, enter the number of people in your party and we will take care of you!
Q: What's included in my ticket?
Your ticket includes a full Lobster dinner with one fresh Atlantic lobster brimming with the freshest mussels, prawns, Chris Brothers pepperoni, juicy corn, potatoes, and a golden-baked cheddar biscuit.
Q: Does my ticket include gratuity?
No, gratuity is not included with your Lobster Boil ticket.
 @blowersgrafton
 blowersgrafton
 @blowersgrafton

results.name: Packwood Grand Calgary 2024
results.description_without_html:
PACKWOOD GRAND is a true celebration of old world leisure and sophistication. This refined and colourful event sets the stage for the ultimate in luxury, horse racing, fashion, and food & drink. This is the must-attend social & lifestyle event of the summer; the see and be-seen for Calgary's highly cultured and fashion forward bon-vivants.
The opportunity to attend PACKWOOD GRAND is by invitation only. Request an invitation at www.packwoodgrand.com/invitation.html.
The PACKWOOD GRAND experience includes: 

Well-appointed covered and open-air viewing areas, comfortable seating lounges, and private suites. 
A spectacularly crafted luncheon, treats and more designed by our Executive Chef.
A menu of premium cocktails designed by our Executive Mixologist, and a selection of premium wine, champagne, beer and spirits for purchase. 
Private access to wagering kiosks and terminals, concierge services, and betting assistance. 
Access to the PACKWOOD GRAND Starting Gate pre-race event, with (optional) transportation to/from Century Downs Racetrack and Casino. 
Access to the PACKWOOD GRAND Winner's Circle held post-race.
Unique sites and sounds, gifts from our partners, and more. 

Scenes of the day:

10:00AM to 11:30AM - The PACKWOOD GRAND Starting Gate pre-race event. 
11:30AM - (Optional) transportation to Century Downs Racetrack and Casino departs from the Starting Gate event.
12:00PM - Official opening of PACKWOOD GRAND and the red carpet at Century Downs Racetrack and Casino.
1:10PM - Racing begins.
5:00PM - (Estimated) final race of the day.
5:30PM - (Optional) return transportation to the PACKWOOD GRAND Winner's Circle event (departure time will vary based on end of racing).
6:00PM - PACKWOOD GRAND Winner's Circle.

results.name: Badlands Music Festival with Rewind
results.description_without_html:
Close out your summer with an unforgettable night at the Badlands Music Festival featuring Rewind, happening on July 14th, 2024, at the iconic Badlands Tent in Calgary, Alberta. 
Rewind, known for their incredible performances of classic hits, will take you on a nostalgic journey through some of the greatest music of past decades.
This event promises to be a sensational finale to the festival, showcasing some of the best throwback hits and timeless classics.
The Badlands Music Festival is not just a concert; it's an experience. Whether you're a longtime fan of electronic music or looking to discover new sounds, this festival offers the perfect blend of cutting-edge music and a vibrant party atmosphere. Don't miss out on this epic event—get your tickets now and be part of a night to remember!

results.name: MAYORKUN LIVE IN CALGARY
results.description_without_html: Adewale Mayowa Emmanuel (born 23 March 1994), known professionally as Mayorkun, is a Nigerian singer, songwriter and pianist. He released a cover of Davido's "The Money" single and was discovered by the singer on Twitter. Mayorkun was signed to Davido's record label DMW from 2016 to 2021&semi his debut single "Eleko" was released under the label. Mayorkun released his debut studio album The Mayor of Lagos in November 2018. After his exit from DMW in 2021&semi he released "Let Me Know" and his debut studio album Back In Office in October 2021, under Sony Music West Africa division. Mayorkun has hits like “certified loner”, "Holy father", "Mama", "Betty Butter" as he embarks on this Canada tour August 2024 .

results.name: INDUSRTY SUNDAYS
results.description_without_html:
After the show is the after PARTY!
Brand new Industry Night happening inside the all new premium Lounge LvL (by Fire n Ice) every Sunday ft DJ Blaze & Special Guests. 
Free on Guestlist till 11pm.

location.name: Fire N Ice Bar & Sheesha Lounge

constants.You may revoke your authorization at any: You may revoke your authorization at any time, subject to providing 10 business days notice before the next scheduled transaction by emailing finance@showpass.com. You have certain recourse rights if any debit does not comply with this agreement. For example, you have the right to receive reimbursement for any debit that is not authorized or is not consistent with this PAD Agreement. popularCities.description: Discover the best events and things to do in Calgary, a vibrant city with a wide range of activities! Immerse yourself in the local culture as you watch ice skating enthusiasts enjoy their Tim Hortons coffee. Feel the excitement as residents cheer on the Calgary Flames and Calgary Stampede, embodying their passion for hockey and cowboy hats. Exciting events, captivating concerts, and engaging activities await around every corner.

Discover the best events and things to do in Vancouver! Experience the joy of kayaking alongside playful seals, embark on invigorating hikes, and embrace unique yoga sessions. Join the locals in enjoying hilarious stand-up comedy shows that will leave you laughing the night away with friends and family. In Vancouver, laughter and quirky escapades are always in store.

Welcome to Toronto, a city where skyscrapers touch the sky and breathtaking lake views await! Indulge in the diverse food scene where poutine and sushi become the perfect pair. Take your bravery to new heights at the iconic CN Tower and soak up the vibrant entertainment in downtown.

Discover the excitement of Edmonton! From exhilarating bison encounters at Elk Island to enchanting winter adventures in ice castles, there's no shortage of unforgettable experiences and events. Join the poutine craze, indulge in non-stop concerts, make a splash at waterparks, and immerse yourself in lively festivals.

Welcome to Seattle, where the Emerald City meets epic adventures! Rain or shine, this place rocks. Stroll through Pike Place Market, catch a glimpse of the iconic Space Needle, and taste your way through a coffee paradise. Then, dive into the funky Fremont neighbourhood and embrace its quirky art. Coffee, music, and stunning scenery await in this Pacific gem!

Welcome to Winnipeg, the heart and soul of the prairies! Immerse yourself in a city that has a blend of rich history, thriving arts, and a bustling culinary scene. From festivals that celebrate diverse cultures to exploring the scenic beauty of parks and rivers, Winnipeg offers year-round excitement.

Discover the enchanting city of Saskatoon, where prairie beauty meets urban excitement! Whether you're exploring the stunning riverbank, immersing yourself in the thriving arts and music scene, or indulging in culinary delights inspired by local flavors, Saskatoon offers an unforgettable experience throughout the year, leaving you in awe of its natural charm and vibrant cultural tapestry

Discover Edinburgh, Texas: A vibrant hub of events, attractions, and unique activities. Dive into the heart of Texas culture, enjoy unforgettable experiences, and make memories in Edinburgh's top destinations. Your next adventure awaits!

Welcome to Kelowna, the vibrant gem of the Okanagan Valley! From picturesque vineyards and orchards to breathtaking lakes and mountains, our city is a year-round paradise offering endless adventures, delectable culinary experiences, and captivating cultural events that will leave you mesmerized

Ottawa, Canada's capital, where stunning architecture and a vibrant art scene await! Discover the city's 29 museums, explore beautiful parks, and take leisurely walks along tree-lined streets. Immerse yourself in the beauty of gardens and indulge in chic cafes, brunch spots, and lively farmers markets. Ottawa, is a city that will capture your heart.

Welcome to Victoria, a charming city that combines coastal beauty with captivating experiences! Explore serene gardens and historic architecture as you stroll along the Inner Harbour. Immerse yourself in the local arts scene, from intimate galleries to lively street performances. Join in the coastal rhythm as you indulge in fresh seafood and enjoy outdoor adventures, creating unforgettable memories at every turn.

Welcome to Whistler, the ultimate playground for snow enthusiasts and mountain adventurers! Experience the majesty of the mountains and the fluffy snow. Prepare for heart-racing adventures, from exhilarating skiing to epic explorations on mountain biking trails. The possibilities for fun things to do and engaging activities are limitless.

Welcome to Hamilton, a city of endless exploration! Dive into local museums where history comes to life, embrace the vibrant arts scene where creativity is at every corner, and explore the bustling downtown where music fills the air. And the best part? Just a short distance away, you'll find nature trails, parks, and breathtaking waterfalls, waiting to be explored.

Come visit the white sand beaches in Prince Edward and soak up the sun. Get ready for tastings that will make your taste buds sing with joy at the local wineries and distilleries. Immerse yourself in the city's vibrant festivals, and set sail with the Yacht Clubs for an adventure on the waves. The perfect recipe for the best time!
